headline: Hilton Expects Leisure-, Business-Travel Demand to Continue to Grow in 2025 Despite Political Challenges
summary: Hilton expects higher profit and revenue in 2025, driven in part by modest growth in leisure travel and steady consumer spending, Chief Executive Chris Nassetta said.

raw.headline: Hilton Expects Leisure-, Business-Travel Demand to Continue to Grow in 2025 Despite Political Challenges
raw.summary: Hilton expects higher profit and revenue in 2025, driven in part by modest growth in leisure travel and steady consumer spending, Chief Executive Chris Nassetta said.

headline: Hilton Stock Up on Q4 Earnings & Revenue Beat, RevPAR Climbs Y/Y
summary: HLT's fourth-quarter 2024 results reflect strong growth in RevPAR, thanks to occupancy and ADR growth. Dive in to know the factors that drove the results.

raw.headline: Hilton Stock Up on Q4 Earnings & Revenue Beat, RevPAR Climbs Y/Y

headline: Hilton Stock Hits All-Time High as CEO Says Business Travel Demand Is Rising
summary: Hilton shares hit a record high Thursday as executives said the hotel chain has seen an uptick in business demand.

raw.headline: Hilton Stock Hits All-Time High as CEO Says Business Travel Demand Is Rising
raw.summary: Hilton shares hit a record high Thursday as executives said the hotel chain has seen an uptick in business demand.

headline: Hilton CEO: Post-Election Bump for Business Travel and China Rebound
summary: Hilton's loyalty program has 211 million members now. That's a lot of people who might be sad if a future AI tool books them into a Marriott instead. So executives are investing in AI to keep as much control over hotel booking patterns as possible.

raw.headline: Hilton CEO: Post-Election Bump for Business Travel and China Rebound
raw.summary: Hilton's loyalty program has 211 million members now. That's a lot of people who might be sad if a future AI tool books them into a Marriott instead. So executives are investing in AI to keep as much control over hotel booking patterns as possible.

headline: Hilton stock pops on earnings beat despite weak outlook
summary: Hilton (HLT) shares are trading higher after the hotel company reported better-than-expected fourth quarter profit, while its first quarter and full-year outlook fell short. Catalysts host Madison Mills joins Wealth with Brad Smith to outline what investors need to know. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.

headline: Hilton Worldwide (HLT) Q4 Earnings: How Key Metrics Compare to Wall Street Estimates
